title: The Little Pleasures of Paris - 1st Edition (2016).epub Gooner
description:
The Little Pleasures of Paris - 1st Edition (2016).epub Gooner

Publisher: Chronicle Books; 01 edition (3 May 2016)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 145214172X
ISBN-13: 978-1452141725

This enchanting tour of Paris's most charming places, objects, and pastimes has been lovingly complied by Francophile extraordinaire Leslie Jonath and brought to vivid life by rising-star illustrator Lizzy Stewart. Organised by season, and featuring places and experiences foods, parks, bakeries, museums, streets, festivals, and more that are quintessentially Parisian, The Little Pleasures of Paris is a classic love letter to the City of Light, but with an idiosyncratic twist: Unusual details that might otherwise go unnoticed are celebrated in both word and image, offering a uniquely poetic and intimate perspective
